Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: Early and Hate-First part, which represent his youth and college days, respectively. It shows how Chicago developed as a thinker on innocent boys robbed by fraternal groups in kindergarten days to weakness caused by loneliness during his college years.
